attributes.action: Keep Deactivated Weapons Legal by changing  the Proposed EU Directive on Guns
attributes.additional_details:
Terrorists and criminals easily source and use working guns Thousands of law abiding people own "deacts " without any problems The proposal would seriously impact collectors, re-enactors  hobbyists and museums . It would also deprive thousands of honest citizens of their property without compensation as once passed no transfer of ownership can legally be made rendering currently valuable property worthless 
http://clapham-man.blogspot.com/2016/02/save-our-deactivated-firearms.html
attributes.background: The European Union ,  in responce to the Paris terror attacks , are proposing to amend the  EU Firearms Directive to  ban certain semi-automatic firearms,  "which will not, under any circumstance, be allowed to be held by private persons, even if they have been permanently deactivated  ".

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling for action from the EU. We can only accept petitions that call for action by the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to work with other EU member states to achieve the outcome you want.
